attributes.action: Oppose any nomination for Tony Blair to become the President of the European Union (EU)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair promised the British people that if his party were elected for a third term, he would serve them for a full third term.

Instead he stepped down, announcing his intention to not honour his promise of serving a full term just 16 months after he was elected.

Since he reneged on his promise to serve the British people, he has commenced a lucrative career in public speaking and Directorships.

As somebody that has demonstrably put the British peoples interests after his own, and failed to serve them in the past in the way that he promised that he would, he is not a worthy candidate to serve the British people and the wider population of Europe as its first President.

If you agree with this we urge you to sign the petition
